favourite.article: Great song, very pleasant joyful new tune! We have been singing this every where with everyone.

This song is really nice because the lyrics tells me that Christ is in everyone of us. So, starting from now on I can see there's a vision or a sign that Christ is here! Our Bridegroom is here yet He wanted to dwell in us. OH! such a wonderful story I've ever heard. From now on I cannot forget whenever I'm down I have to move forward to the Lord my God. I'm glad to know the Lord since young. I'll never forget that Christ is in me Always! HALLELUJAH!
